title: Fixing Ziggs
body: His passive does double damage to turrets. Reduce it to like...1.5 or so. That or make it scale up over time. If that doesn't do it alone, make his tower execute like up to 30% tower health rather than 35%. I imagine it'd be problem solved at that point.

replies.body: The actual problem is ADC balance, not ziggs. ziggs is weak, he is just filling a vacuum.
And if marksmen are made stronger, they'll run us all over. The point is to have a medium, not just force marksmen on the meta *forever*.
